page.title: 07RECREATION.
page.content: In Marston Magna all the people are very friendly.Most of them join in with the activities that go on.There are lots of things to do.There is the Women's Institute in which the women join in with the activities around the village .They have meetings and a speaker comes to talk to them.There are competitions such as baking a cake .The best one gets a small prize. The British Legion is made up of mainly ex service men and old people. The wives and ladies are sometimes invited along.There are no youth clubs and so the children have to go to villages outside Marston.The village hall once belonged to the Foresters. The entertainment in the village is put on by everyone.They all join together and put on shows.Every two weeks there is a bingo game in the British Legion.
